typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		DEPT_ID as integer,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emp
emp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> emptarget
